name.value: FHIR Connectathon 17 - Terminology Services - Translate - OK - GET - XML

description.value: ConceptMap $translate tests against known FHIR code systems where the expected outcome is a successful response with a matched code value from the target system. All $translate operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP GET method.
ConceptMap create, read and translate operations

ConceptMap $translate operation test using HTTP GET; http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|home, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse. Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the matched target system code.
Test ConceptMap $translate operation for http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|home, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter result with boolean value equal to true.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter match with part concept and valueCoding.code equal to 'H'.
